Class BookingManager

java.lang.Object
main.control.dataManagers.DataManager
main.control.dataManagers.BookingManager
public class BookingManager extends DataManager
Manages booking operations for flats in the BTO application system. Includes functionality for handling booking requests and updating booking statuses.
